title: Shikkaku Mon no Saikyou Kenja~ Sekai Saikyou no Kenja ga Sarani Tsuyoku Naru Tameni Tenseishimashita~ - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Martial Arts   School Life
tags: Academy   Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manga   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Artifact Crafting   Beautiful Female Lead   Cheats   Crafting   Demons   Dense Protagonist   Dragons   Dungeons   Elemental Magic   Fantasy World   Hiding True Identity   Kingdoms   Lack of Common Sense   Loli   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Naive Protagonist   Nobles   Overpowered Protagonist   Previous Life Talent   Reincarnation   Strong to Stronger   Sword And Magic   Time Travel   Underestimated Protagonist
author: Shinkou Shotou   進行諸島
description: In a certain world, there was someone who excelled in magic combat, people called him 『Sage』. Seeking the strongest combat art, he devoted himself to research every magic and combat arts in existence. And the conclusion he arrived at was very cruel, 『My body is not fit for magic combat』. Yet he didn’t give up. He sealed his own soul with a magic art, and was reborn in a far-off future. And the magic theory in the completely changed world he saw there was of unbelievably low level.>
